general.no_user_found: No authenticated user found. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.
general.no_study_token: No study token found. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.

error_texts.general_error: An error occurred. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and try again.

firebase_errors.firestore_instance_error: An error occured during the initialization of the Firebase Firestore Instance/App. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.
firebase_errors.firebase_auth_no_user_error: No authenticated user found. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.
firebase_errors.firebase_auth_sign_in_error: An error occurred during the anonymous sign in. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.
firebase_errors.firestore_user_doc_ref_error: An error occured during the initialization of the Firebase Firestore User Document Reference. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.
firebase_errors.firestore_user_doc_snap_error: An error occured during the initialization of the Firebase Firestore User Document Snapshot. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.
firebase_errors.firestore_user_doc_update_error: An error occured when trying to update the anonymous user document. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.
firebase_errors.firestore_write_error: An error occurred while saving your data. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

introduction.missing_study_token_error: No study token found in cookies. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and return to the start page.

consent.consent_required: Please agree to the consent statement before continuing.

pre_study.form_validation_error: Please complete all required fields before continuing.
pre_study.data_save_error: An error occurred while saving your responses. Please try again.

post_study.form_validation_error: Please complete all required fields before continuing.
post_study.data_save_error: An error occurred while saving your responses. Please try again.

study.gradio_error: An error occured during the initialization of the Gradio application. Please try clearing your browser cache and cookies and reload the page.
study.icon_button_wrapper_error: An error occured when trying to remove the chats icon button wrapper. Do not click the clear button in the chat interface.
